metadata.title: CVE-2022-3344 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the KVM's AMD nested virtualization (SVM). A maliciousL1 guest could purposely fail to intercept the shutdown of a cooperativenested guest (L2), possibly leading to a page fault and kernel panic in thehost (L0).

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
